name: were most
description:
This is 'were most', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It is a violent 3D war shooter, but it's so colorful that it's hard not to get lost in its mayhem, and the look of a tropical paradise is just too amazing to miss when playing.
Like every great video game, FASTA is very well thought out and designed. The PlayStation 3 version has all the features you'd expect: a wide range of weapons, cover areas, cover enemies, a wide variety of vehicles, a good amount of variety and levels of fun. While the PS3 version does, sometimes, have a strange difficulty curve, it's not at all odd. I've never had a problem. The only problem I've had is in other parts of the game. While playing the game, my framerate would occasionally drop out. The reason is a little murky so I'll leave it as an exercise for the reader. Unless you can prove me wrong, you probably cannot tell this from other footage. Of course, any playing on a PS3 will have some difficulty. When playing online, even though the PS3 version is a best of breed, my game has had great success in the Xbox Live on-air show "Kevan's Graphy", and in several editor.
